item.title: Blog: Welcome to the new Code Blind Website!
item.description:
Welcome to the new Code Blind website!

We’ve implemented a new website, to enable lots of new functionality that we’re hoping to take advantage of now and in the future:

  • Ability to support multiple languages
  • Able to write documentation for new features, but keep them hidden until they are released.
  • Search!
  • Pretty Pictures! ðŸ˜Š
  • Easy access to older versions of the documentation

Big thanks to Hugo for being the static site generator, and the docsy team for the core documentation theme ðŸ‘

Please let us know if you have feedback, either by filing an issue , or submitting a pull request or come chat with us on Slack!
